## Chunk.ToStringOptions.injectRuntime property

Toggle whether to inject the runtime in the generated code.

An instance of the runtime is important as it is what will actually schedule and execute code built for Velcro.

When `injectRuntime` is `true`<!-- -->, the runtime code will be injected and the instance of it will be exposed as `Velcro.runtime`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
injectRuntime?: boolean;
```
